reviewText: I wish it had more newer shows in it but it's not bad. Good quality though.
A movie series that my son has enjoyed for a very long time.
this is a good collection of of Scooby-Doo episodes it is fun and enjoyable to watch. if you have not seen this dvd then i recommend you do

Only 3 episodes, but a good 3 episodes.

1) "The Vampire Strikes Back" (What's New Scooby Doo) Available on What's New Scooby Complete Season 2, What's New, Scooby-Doo? Volume 3: Halloween Boos and Clues - (Features The Hex Girls)

2) "A Fit Night Out for Bats" (The Richie Rich/Scooby-Doo Hour) Available on The Richie Rich/Scooby-Doo Show, Vol. One

3) "Vampire Bats and Scaredy Cats" (The Scooby-Doo Show) Available on Scooby Doo's Spookiest Tales - (Features Scooby-Dum)

So this has less episodes that Spookiest Tales, but I think these are better episodes
Scooby-Doo was my favorite as a kid! Now I can buy these DVDs to watch with my (almost) 2 year old son!! And he is just as obsessed as I was/am!!
